==German== {{was fwotd|de|2012|November|17}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|bekomen}}, from {{inh|de|goh|biqueman}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*bikwemaną}}, equivalent to {{prefix|de|be|kommen}}. Cognate to {{cog|nl|bekomen}}, {{cog|en|become}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/bəˈkɔmən/}} * {{hyphenation|de|be|kom|men}} * {{audio|de|De-bekommen.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-bekommen.ogg|audio (Austria)}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-strong|class=4|bekommt|bekam|bekommen|past subjunctive=bekäme|auxiliary=both}} # {{lb|de|transitive|auxiliary: “[[haben]]”}} to [[receive]]; to [[get]] #* '''2003''', Franz Eugen Schlachter, ''Die Bibel'' (“Schlachter 2000”), Genfer Bibelgesellschaft, Numbers 34:14: #*: Denn der Stamm der Kinder Rubens mit ihren Vaterhäusern, und der Stamm der Kinder Gads mit ihren Vaterhäusern haben ihren Teil empfangen, auch der halbe Stamm Manasse hat seinen Teil '''bekommen'''. #*:: Then the tribe of Reuben’s children with the houses of their father, and the tribe of Gad’s children with the houses of their father have obtained their part, also half the tribe of Manasseh '''got''' their part.{{attention|de|Translation needs checking}} #: {{uxi|de|Hunger '''bekommen'''|to get hungry, become hungry (literally, “to get hunger”)}} #: {{uxi|de|ein Kind '''bekommen'''|to have a child}} # {{lb|de|transitive|auxiliary: “[[haben]]”}} to [[catch]] #: {{uxi|de|den Schnupfen '''bekommen'''|to catch a cold}} # {{lb|de|intransitive|with a dative case object|of food or drink|auxiliary: “[[sein]]”}} to [[agree]] with (someone); to [[sit]] well with (someone) #: {{ux|de|Das Essen '''bekommt''' ihm nicht.|The food does not agree with him.}} ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-strong|bekomm|bekam|bekommen|hs|||bekäm|a}} ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|receive, catch}} {{l|de|kriegen}} ====Derived terms==== {{der-top3}} * {{l|de|Bekommen}} * {{l|de|bekommend}} * {{l|de|bekommen}} * {{l|de|abbekommen}} * {{l|de|aufbekommen}} * {{l|de|bekömmlich}} * {{l|de|fertigbekommen}} {{der-mid3}} * {{l|de|herausbekommen}} * {{l|de|hereinbekommen}} * {{l|de|hinbekommen}} * {{l|de|mitbekommen}} {{der-mid3}} * {{l|de|wegbekommen}} * {{l|de|zubekommen}} * {{l|de|zurückbekommen}} * {{l|de|zusammenbekommen}} {{der-bottom}} ===See also=== * {{l|de|empfangen|pos=v}} * {{l|de|erhalten|pos=v}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Swedish== ===Etymology=== {{sv-verb-form-pastpart|bekomma}} ===Adjective=== {{head|sv|adjective}} # [[received]], [[acquired]] ====Declension==== {{sv-adj-pastpart|2=bekommet|3=bekomne|4=bekomna}}
